topics.body:
I remember this one time I got in a baking mood. I decided to make a cake. But this was no ordinary cake. It was a three layer circular cake. The top and bottom layer chocolate cake and the middle layer was brownie. With milk chocolate frosting between the layers. And then I covered it in cream cheese frosting.
I call it the *CHOCOPOCALYPSE.*
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
